Name: Blasto-Seal
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise.  Swap a Blasto-Claw and a Blasto-Card for a Blasto-Seal at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
